content:
I'd like to defer the following tracker items from the next release of SDC (meaning they'd be waiting about a year to be addressed. Please take a look at the list and see if you have any concerns.
image.png FHIR-10562 a walkthrough of a simple concrete example would be nice Eric Haas
FHIR-25219 Add link in rendering page to details on multi-language support in sdc Kenneth Myhra
FHIR-28611 Updates for answer.valueCoding.ordinalValue Paul Lynch
FHIR-20820 Definition-based extraction: selection of resource for itemContext Paul Lynch
FHIR-21303 Unclear about mandatory vs. Optional - SDC #1 Bas van den Heuvel
FHIR-21426 An example would help here. - SDC #115 Bas van den Heuvel
FHIR-23977 Move preferred terminology server extension to core namespace Paul Lynch
FHIR-24934 SDC guide should note use of translation packs as code system supplements Grahame Grieve
FHIR-25442 SDC Combination clarification Shamil Nizamov
FHIR-21357 Questionnaires should also be allowed for elements and data types? Why limit to resources? - SDC #46 Bas van den Heuvel
FHIR-21432 Allow ActivityDefinitino to create FHIR responses - SDC #121 Bas van den Heuvel
FHIR-25186 Attester for QuestionnaireResponse Rick Geimer
FHIR-31360 Add CQL-only populate and extraction mechanisms similar to StructureMap Lloyd McKenzie
FHIR-32664 Clarify that htable and table items should have a common answer list Paul Lynch
FHIR-33125 maxSize type & meaning Paul Lynch
FHIR-33537 Ensure we have profiles and examples for all operations Lloyd McKenzie
FHIR-33675 Add support for input / keyboard hints Tilo Christ
FHIR-6884 2015May sdc #101 - Add example for OASIS or MDS Michelle Miller
FHIR-15673 Add a means of modifying a question based on another question's answer Paul Lynch
FHIR-18054 Clarification needed for "Must support: [number]" Paul Lynch
FHIR-30082 Allow both answerOption and answerValueSet for an item Lloyd McKenzie
FHIR-9437 Test scripts should include AuditEvent & Provenance Lloyd McKenzie
@Grahame Grieve @Eric Haas @Paul Lynch @Bas van den Heuvel @Kenneth Myhra @Shamil Nizamov @Rick Geimer @Tilo Christ

Note that one of these - FHIR-21303 has a negative vote behind it and I'm open to putting some wording in the specification that says that - in this release - the shalls and shoulds are a bit unclear and so should be taken with a grain of salt. But I don't think we can nail them down in a timely fashion for this release.

For FHIR-33675, would that mean that it will be added to a future build of the IG sometime during the course of the following year and then make it into a released version a year from now? Is there anything that would prevent me from implementing as described in the tracker item (which I have in essence already done)? Sorry, I'm not with this group for long enough to fully grasp the consequences of an item being deferred.
